name: alejandroadam
text: this kills me. I die laughing.

name: fielding
text: Apparently, the guy in the Victorian diving apparatus is doing it all wrong; all he has to do is look at this comic, in which he is featured.

name: cailetshadow
text: hell of an existentialist conundrum, man

name: dumase
text: And the patient says "But Doctor, i AM Pagliacci"

name: i_love_kate
text:
That's my hotmail name. But I thought of it as a reference to Watchmen before I knew about the whole opera thing.

It is a source of occasional shame to me.

name: cryztal
text: A comment left by cryztal was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Scorpio_nadir, theplaidknight, Madoushi, libelandslander)

name: theplaidknight
text: Apples and oranges, sir.  Your comment is far too generalized.

name: cryztal
text:
Two haiku for you!

Well. I'm not a sir.
Unless Cryztal is a dude's name.
But I could be wrong.

What was I thinking,
Being general online?
Sorry for faux pas.

name: truthandcoffee
text:
I like the effort
It's too bad your second line
Has eight syllables

name: cryztal
text: Well shit.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: As well it should be. Now lay down and die like a good clown.

text: what happened is the kid went swimming after eating a hamburger and the father didn't warn him.

text: achewood is a terrifying journey of the too real

text: That suicide would be one hell of a youtube video.

text: Teodor wanted to get some dope from Ray

text: Astutely noticed my friend!

text: No, sirs. It is Ray who gets dope from Teodor. He probably needed some olive oil.

text: Could be dope, could be bandaids or a cup of Ketel_1.

text: maybe it's just a fact of people who tend to play online strip poker

text: They need something else to think about.

name: gowerski
text:
i'd thought it was everyones poker faces they were trying to pull.

gonna give a guy with a sick kid more cash right?

text: Not if it was his fault, no.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Isn't everything Ray ever does 'accidental'?

name: nurdbot
text: A comment left by nurdbot was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mortshire, Zem, Shinkicka)

name: direhaggis
text: Terminal diseases and getting naked. I mean, why not?

name: closefriend
text: There's nothing more awesome looking than a Victorian diving apparatus. If the guy is going to play a stacked game of Russian roulette, hopefully it can be salvaged.

name: spinynorman
text: This will always make me think of the Dali scene from The Amazing Adventures of Kavalier and Klay.

name: laserblade
text: You have saved a great life.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Did they make that into a movie and no one told me? Dammit, Jim!
That guy, he can write.

name: boxus
text: achewood achieves brilliant and memorabe characterization in the space of one panel. gold.

name: tombsgrave
text: The best part (not involving the other best parts): these people are playing strip poker and are wearing as many clothes as they can to prevent themselves from getting anywhere near nude.

name: hendetta
text: A comment left by hendetta was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, layzerblade, _cheesekayke, rhino, Slab64)

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by tekende, heccibiggs, hypercube, mygoodfriend, Connellingus)

name: tomsonlocal
text: Maybe the guy in the diving apparatus is upset that he came last in the London marathon.

name: gumfish
text: I wonder if the gun would actually pierce the helmet. If it didn't, and the helmet is as airtight as it looks, then it'd produce one hell of an ear-wrecking sound. Maybe he's a masochist.

name: stuart
text: I just love the idea of that image, staying perfectly still, with a gun in hand occasionally coming up for a few seconds very slowly.

name: epicurus
text: exactly

name: stuart
text:
wait for it
[IMGS OFF]

name: rowboat
text: Damn. You computer people amaze me. I'm sure it's simple, but try telling me that.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: it is usually me posting the gifs. this one is rad. chubbied.

name: cbtbone
text: Oh man that is too perfect would you please just GET OUT OF MY HEAD!!!!

name: aliiis
text: I gave this asset its 69th chubby

name: atticusonline
text: I'm really sad that I can't chubby this more.

name: lucid
text: I was really really hoping he'd drop the gun back out of frame really suddenly, as though he'd chickened out. But it is still Chubberific.

name: deus
text: THIS IS LOST FOREVER!

name: dougthehead
text: This might give some insight into Ray's character.  He seems all cheerful and everything, but look what he spends his time doing, and look how depressed everyone else doing it is.  Dude could have mad repression issues.

name: saint
text: I wonder...what the guy in the Victorian diving apparatus would take off first in strip poker?

name: honesttom
text: One bolt.

name: cailetshadow
text: SO SEXY

name: spinynorman
text: Somewhere there is a fetish for this.

name: baryonyx
text: Oooh la LA! La la la la la LAAA!

name: astro_zombie
text: Worst strip poker played on ugliest webcam.

name: dasilodavi
text: I kind of wish the entire strip was just the last panel.  Still gets a five though.

name: peterjoel
text: Online strip poker is hell of depressing.

name: hypoluxa
text: I believe it makes me a horrible person, but "He's pretty sure it's his fault" is absolutely hilarious to me.

name: empy
text: This is my favorite comic of ever.

name: c_dizzle
text: I. Can't. Stop. Laughing.

name: tinhand
text: If no-one had told me it was driving apperatus, I would have had no frickin idea. To me it just looks like some sort of blinged up glass robot (which probably isn't a great life in itself) .

name: the_stoned_one
text:
The moral of this strip is:
Family will always bring you down
ditch those fuckers

name: boopy
text: the man in the victorian diving apparatus would have to lose quite a few hands in order to lose the helmet, so that his bullets would be effective.

name: wittyname
text: Why can't Ray dress up like this every strip?

name: notcool
text: Do you have any idea how long it takes to get that gussied up just to be taking off your clothes for the internet? Also, I think that's the same suit he wore to RB's wedding, minus the tophat and that...thing...around his neck.

name: howl
text: The alt text is true, the internet really is the Depression Superhighway. Everywhere you go, man

name: broahsaurus
text:
This strip reminds me of this in many different ways.
Actually only one way really but that is all I need.

name: prism
text: The man in the Victorian diving apparatus is normally passive, but lay one finger on his little sister and he will bash your head in with a defunct mining apparatus.

name: theguitarhero
text: Ha.

name: genequagmire
text:
"Depression Superhighway".

Classic.
